plot: Night-time in the province, a country road and a hearse. A story about the old ferryman who conveys the souls of the dead from the world of the living to the world beyond. And about Andreas...
title: Der Fährmeister
plot_es: Night-time in the province, a country road and a hearse. A story about the old ferryman who conveys the souls of the dead from the world of the living to the world beyond. And about Andreas...
plot_en: Night-time in the province, a country road and a hearse. A story about the old ferryman who conveys the souls of the dead from the world of the living to the world beyond. And about Andreas...
